summary.span: 对可选项列表提供了几个不同的可视化表示形式。

span.span: Provides several different visual representations for a list of selectable items.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维护一个或多个选定的项的选择。The class maintains the selection of single or multiple selected items. 直接派生自类，并没有任何处理属性，如分页属性。The is derived directly from the class and does not have any of the pagination handling properties, such as the property. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，属性的类是在初始页面加载期间创建的值数组。In the following code example, the property of the class is an array of values that is created during the initial page load. 您可以更改的设置属性以查看不同版本的。You can change the setting of the property to see different versions of a . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的项后创建控件和数据绑定，此事件处理程序设置的属性的列表项的从任意表达式。When an item in a control is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions. 中的项控件是类型。An item in a control is of type . 如绑定每个数据源项，将引发此事件。This event is raised as each data source item is bound. 这是筛选或分组的项的最佳时间集合，通过使用或属性。This is the best time to filter or group items of the collection, by using the or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用方法所引用对象属性将数据加载到从客户端浏览器发送 post 数据的控件。The method uses the method on the object referenced by the property to load data into the control from the post data sent by the client browser. 如果不没有加载此控件的回发数据的任何特定于设备的处理，然后方法将返回`true`。If there is no device-specific handling for loading the postback data on this control, then the method returns `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置选择列表中的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows in the selection list.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The number of rows in the selection list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 4;最小值为 1，无最大值。The default value is 4; the minimum is 1, with no maximum. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在回发时，若要展开的列表。The following code example shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 已尝试将 设置为小于零的值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回选择的项的索引。

span.span: Returns the index of the selected item.

summary.span: 默认值为 -1。
此 API 已过时。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The index of the selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件处于多重选择模式下，此属性将返回第一个选定项的索引。If the control is in multiple selection mode, this property returns the index of the first selected item. 不能以声明方式; 设置的所选的索引使用改为项列表的属性。The selected index cannot be set declaratively; use the property of a list item instead. 设置为-1 以清除选定内容。Set the to -1 to clear the selection. 当你想要动态地从列表中删除项时，这很有用。This is useful when you want to dynamically remove items from the list.

exception.span: 已尝试将 属性设置为小于 或大于等于项数。

span.span: an attempt was made to set the property to less than or greater than or equal to the number of items.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedIndexChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 每当用户更改 对象的选择时发生。

span.span: Occurs whenever a user changes the selection of a object.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改客户端上的选项不会生成回发事件。Changing the selection on the client does not generate a postback event. 如果通过一些其他控件生成一个回发事件，并且所选内容已更改，在服务器上调用此事件。This event is called on the server if a postback event is generated by some other control and the selection has changed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件。The following code example shows how to use the event. 它还演示如何使用属性在回发时，若要展开的列表。It also shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). value.span: 用于提供选择 UI 的 UI 类型。

span.span: Type of UI used to provide a selection UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象可以呈现为`CheckBox`， `DropDown`， `ListBox`， `MultiSelectListBox`，或`Radio`列表中的，具体取决于目标设备。A object can be rendered as a `CheckBox`, `DropDown`, `ListBox`, `MultiSelectListBox`, or `Radio` list, depending on the target device. 控件是允许用户选择多个项，还会影响所选内容类型。The selection type also affects whether the control allows the user to select multiple items. `MultiSelectListBox`和`CheckBox`设置允许选择多个; 其他设置允许单项选择。The `MultiSelectListBox` and `CheckBox` settings allow multiple selections; other settings allow only a single selection. 下表中显示所选内容类型。The selection types are shown in the following table. |`ListSelectType` 值`ListSelectType` value|描述Description|多重选择Multiselect| |----------------------------|-----------------|-----------------| |`CheckBox`|呈现带有复选框和多重选择功能的列表项。Renders list items with check boxes and multiple selection capability.|是Yes| |`DropDown`|在下拉列表框中呈现列表项。Renders list items in a drop-down list box.|否No| |`ListBox`|在列表框中呈现列表项。Renders list items in a list box.|否No| |`MultipleSelectionListBox`|在具有多重选择功能的列表框中呈现列表项。Renders list items in a list box with multiple selection capability.|是Yes| |`Radio`|将列表项作为选项呈现。Renders list items as options.|否No| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件。The following code example shows how to use the event. 它还演示如何使用属性在回发时，若要展开的列表。It also shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]
